alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Ouachita (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:57AM CDT until June 26 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN JACKSON...WEST CENTRAL OUACHITA...NORTHEASTERN BIENVILLE AND SOUTHERN LINCOLN PARISHES... At 756 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Grambling to 7 miles southwest of Jonesboro, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Grambling, Arcadia, Choudrant, Simsboro, Vienna, Lucky, Bienville, Quitman, Eros, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Brice, Liberty Hill, Mineral Springs, Caderville, Sailes and Mount Olive. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
